statements: SELECT * FROM investment_portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolios WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolios ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolios WHERE performance_rating < 2 ORDER BY portfolio_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolios WHERE total_investment > 10000 ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolios WHERE performance_rating >= 4 ORDER BY total_investment ASC;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, total_investment, performance_rating FROM investment_portfolios WHERE total_investment BETWEEN 5000 AND 15000 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolios WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 3 ORDER BY portfolio_name ASC, total_investment DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM investment_portfolios WHERE total_investment < 5000 AND (performance_rating = 1 OR performance_rating = 5) ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio
SELECT portfolio_name, owner_id FROM investment_portfolio WHERE owner_id = 5
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM investment_portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_id DESC
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(portfolio_id) AS total_portfolios FROM investment_portfolio GROUP BY owner_id
SELECT * FROM performance_report WHERE report_date = '2023-06-15'
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio WHERE portfolio_id = 1 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, owner_id FROM investment_portfolio WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY portfolio_name;
SELECT portfolio_id, MAX(date_created) AS latest_date FROM investment_portfolio GROUP BY portfolio_id;

SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.portfolio_name, pr.report_date, pr.performance_metric FROM investment_portfolio p INNER JOIN performance_report pr ON p.portfolio_id = pr.portfolio_id WHERE pr.performance_metric = 'Profit' ORDER BY pr.report_date DESC;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(portfolio_id) AS portfolio_count FROM investment_portfolio GROUP BY owner_id HAVING COUNT(portfolio_id) > 1 ORDER BY portfolio_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, client_id FROM portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolios ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT portfolio_id, performance FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolios ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(amount) AS total_investment FROM investments GROUP BY portfolio_id ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT pr.report_id, pr.report_date, p.portfolio_name, pr.performance FROM performance_reports pr JOIN portfolios p ON pr.portfolio_id = p.portfolio_id WHERE pr.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, created_date FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT investment_id, investment_name, investment_type FROM investment;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, investment_amount FROM investment;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_investment ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, created_date FROM investment_portfolio WHERE created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, investment_amount FROM investment WHERE investment_amount > 10000;

SELECT p.portfolio_name, i.investment_name, ip.investment_date FROM investment_portfolio p INNER JOIN portfolio_investment ip ON p.portfolio_id = ip.portfolio_id INNER JOIN investment i ON i.investment_id = ip.investment_id;

SELECT ip.investment_id, MAX(performance_result) AS max_performance_result FROM investment_performance WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY ip.investment_id ORDER BY max_performance_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT name, date_created FROM portfolio;
SELECT symbol, quantity, purchase_price FROM portfolio_holdings WHERE portfolio_id = 123;
SELECT id, report_date, total_returns FROM performance_reports ORDER BY total_returns DESC;
SELECT id, name, experience_years FROM portfolio_managers WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT id, name, date_created FROM portfolio;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE total_returns > 0.05 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT portfolio.name, COUNT(portfolio_holdings.id) AS num_holdings FROM portfolio JOIN portfolio_holdings ON portfolio.id = portfolio_holdings.portfolio_id GROUP BY portfolio.name;

SELECT portfolio.name, SUM(investment_transactions.amount) AS total_amount FROM portfolio JOIN investment_transactions ON portfolio.id = investment_transactions.portfolio_id GROUP BY portfolio.name HAVING total_amount > 50000;

SELECT portfolio.name, portfolio_managers.name AS manager_name, portfolio_managers.experience_years FROM portfolio JOIN portfolio_managers ON portfolio.name = portfolio_managers.name ORDER BY portfolio_managers.experience_years DESC;
